verses.verse: Woe <S%H1945><s%> to her that is filthy <S%H4784><s%> and polluted, <S%H1351><s%> to the oppressing <S%H3238><s%> city! <S%H5892><s%>

She obeyed <S%H8085><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> the voice; <S%H6963><s%> she received <S%H3947><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> correction; <S%H4148><s%> she trusted <S%H982><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> in the LORD; <S%H3068><s%> she drew not near <S%H7126><s%> <S%H3808><s%> to <S%H413><s%> her God. <S%H430><s%>

Her princes <S%H8269><s%> within <S%H7130><s%> her are roaring <S%H7580><s%> lions; <S%H738><s%> her judges <S%H8199><s%> are evening <S%H6153><s%> wolves; <S%H2061><s%> they gnaw not the bones <S%H1633><s%> <S%H3808><s%> till the morrow. <S%H1242><s%>

Her prophets <S%H5030><s%> are light <S%H6348><s%> and treacherous <S%H900><s%> persons: <S%H376><s%> her priests <S%H3548><s%> have polluted <S%H2490><s%> the sanctuary, <S%H6944><s%> they have done violence <S%H2554><s%> to the law. <S%H8451><s%>

The just <S%H6662><s%> LORD <S%H3068><s%> is in the midst <S%H7130><s%> thereof; he will not <S%H3808><s%> do <S%H6213><s%> iniquity: <S%H5766><s%> every morning <S%H1242><s%> <S%H1242><s%> doth he bring <S%H5414><s%> his judgment <S%H4941><s%> to light, <S%H216><s%> he faileth <S%H5737><s%> not; <S%H3808><s%> but the unjust <S%H5767><s%> knoweth <S%H3045><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> shame. <S%H1322><s%>

I have cut off <S%H3772><s%> the nations: <S%H1471><s%> their towers <S%H6438><s%> are desolate; <S%H8074><s%> I made their streets waste, <S%H2717><s%> <S%H2351><s%> that none <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1097><s%> passeth by: <S%H5674><s%> their cities <S%H5892><s%> are destroyed, <S%H6658><s%> so that there is no <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1097><s%> man, <S%H376><s%> that there is none <S%H4480><s%> <S%H369><s%> inhabitant. <S%H3427><s%>

I said, <S%H559><s%> Surely <S%H389><s%> thou wilt fear <S%H3372><s%> me, thou wilt receive <S%H3947><s%> instruction; <S%H4148><s%> so their dwelling <S%H4583><s%> should not <S%H3808><s%> be cut off, <S%H3772><s%> howsoever <S%H3605><s%> <S%H834><s%> I punished <S%H6485><s%> <S%H5921><s%> them: but <S%H403><s%> they rose early, <S%H7925><s%> and corrupted <S%H7843><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> their doings. <S%H5949><s%>

Therefore <S%H3651><s%> wait <S%H2442><s%> ye upon me, saith <S%H5002><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> until the day <S%H3117><s%> that I rise up <S%H6965><s%> to the prey: <S%H5706><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> my determination <S%H4941><s%> is to gather <S%H622><s%> the nations, <S%H1471><s%> that I may assemble <S%H6908><s%> the kingdoms, <S%H4467><s%> to pour <S%H8210><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> them mine indignation, <S%H2195><s%> even all <S%H3605><s%> my fierce <S%H2740><s%> anger: <S%H639><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the earth <S%H776><s%> shall be devoured <S%H398><s%> with the fire <S%H784><s%> of my jealousy. <S%H7068><s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> then <S%H227><s%> will I turn <S%H2015><s%> to <S%H413><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> a pure <S%H1305><s%> language, <S%H8193><s%> that they may all <S%H3605><s%> call <S%H7121><s%> upon the name <S%H8034><s%> of the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> to serve <S%H5647><s%> him with one <S%H259><s%> consent. <S%H7926><s%>

From beyond <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5676><s%> the rivers <S%H5104><s%> of Ethiopia <S%H3568><s%> my suppliants, <S%H6282><s%> even the daughter <S%H1323><s%> of my dispersed, <S%H6327><s%> shall bring <S%H2986><s%> mine offering. <S%H4503><s%>

In that <S%H1931><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> shalt thou not <S%H3808><s%> be ashamed <S%H954><s%> for all <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3605><s%> thy doings, <S%H5949><s%> wherein <S%H834><s%> thou hast transgressed <S%H6586><s%> against me: for <S%H3588><s%> then <S%H227><s%> I will take away <S%H5493><s%> out of the midst <S%H4480><s%> <S%H7130><s%> of thee them that rejoice <S%H5947><s%> in thy pride, <S%H1346><s%> and thou shalt no <S%H3808><s%> more <S%H3254><s%> <S%H5750><s%> be haughty <S%H1361><s%> because of my holy <S%H6944><s%> mountain. <S%H2022><s%>

I will also leave <S%H7604><s%> in the midst <S%H7130><s%> of thee an afflicted <S%H6041><s%> and poor <S%H1800><s%> people, <S%H5971><s%> and they shall trust <S%H2620><s%> in the name <S%H8034><s%> of the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

The remnant <S%H7611><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> shall not <S%H3808><s%> do <S%H6213><s%> iniquity, <S%H5766><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> speak <S%H1696><s%> lies; <S%H3577><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> shall a deceitful <S%H8649><s%> tongue <S%H3956><s%> be found <S%H4672><s%> in their mouth: <S%H6310><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> they <S%H1992><s%> shall feed <S%H7462><s%> and lie down, <S%H7257><s%> and none <S%H369><s%> shall make them afraid. <S%H2729><s%>

Sing, <S%H7442><s%> O daughter <S%H1323><s%> of Zion; <S%H6726><s%> shout, <S%H7321><s%> O Israel; <S%H3478><s%> be glad <S%H8055><s%> and rejoice <S%H5937><s%> with all <S%H3605><s%> the heart, <S%H3820><s%> O daughter <S%H1323><s%> of Jerusalem. <S%H3389><s%>

The LORD <S%H3068><s%> hath taken away <S%H5493><s%> thy judgments, <S%H4941><s%> he hath cast out <S%H6437><s%> thine enemy: <S%H341><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> even the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> is in the midst <S%H7130><s%> of thee: thou shalt not <S%H3808><s%> see <S%H7200><s%> evil <S%H7451><s%> any more. <S%H5750><s%>

In that <S%H1931><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> it shall be said <S%H559><s%> to Jerusalem, <S%H3389><s%> Fear <S%H3372><s%> thou not: <S%H408><s%> and to Zion, <S%H6726><s%> Let not <S%H408><s%> thine hands <S%H3027><s%> be slack. <S%H7503><s%>

The LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> in the midst <S%H7130><s%> of thee is mighty; <S%H1368><s%> he will save, <S%H3467><s%> he will rejoice <S%H7797><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> thee with joy; <S%H8057><s%> he will rest <S%H2790><s%> in his love, <S%H160><s%> he will joy <S%H1523><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> thee with singing. <S%H7440><s%>

I will gather <S%H622><s%> them that are sorrowful <S%H3013><s%> for the solemn assembly, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4150><s%> who are <S%H1961><s%> of <S%H4480><s%> thee, to whom the reproach <S%H2781><s%> of <S%H5921><s%> it was a burden. <S%H4864><s%>

Behold, <S%H2009><s%> at that <S%H1931><s%> time <S%H6256><s%> I will undo <S%H6213><s%> <S%H853><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> that afflict <S%H6031><s%> thee: and I will save <S%H3467><s%> <S%H853><s%> her that halteth, <S%H6760><s%> and gather <S%H6908><s%> her that was driven out; <S%H5080><s%> and I will get <S%H7760><s%> them praise <S%H8416><s%> and fame <S%H8034><s%> in every <S%H3605><s%> land <S%H776><s%> where they have been put to shame. <S%H1322><s%>

At that <S%H1931><s%> time <S%H6256><s%> will I bring <S%H935><s%> you again, even in the time <S%H6256><s%> that I gather <S%H6908><s%> you: for <S%H3588><s%> I will make <S%H5414><s%> you a name <S%H8034><s%> and a praise <S%H8416><s%> among all <S%H3605><s%> people <S%H5971><s%> of the earth, <S%H776><s%> when I turn back <S%H7725><s%> <S%H853><s%> your captivity <S%H7622><s%> before your eyes, <S%H5869><s%> saith <S%H559><s%> the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>
